bug.author: KimSangYeon-DGU
bug.summary: In OSX check of Travis, `GmmTrainMainTest/GmmTrainDiffKmeansMaxIterationsTest` index out of bounds error.
bug.description: I noticed this error from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/2022>#2022</denchmark-link> . In OSX check of Travis, failed because of , while all the 3 Linux checks passed. Below is the log of the OSX check in the Travis. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/files/3665728/log.txt>log.txt</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/KimSangYeon-DGU>@KimSangYeon-DGU</denchmark-link> , I took a look into this one today but I haven't seen any OS X test failures for in the past month or so (looking at the Travis build history). I think that maybe <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/2026>#2026</denchmark-link> solved this one---have you seen the issue since <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/2026>#2026</denchmark-link> was merged?

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rcurtin>@rcurtin</denchmark-link> , I think it is a temporary issue that occurs rarely because I haven't seen any issue since I opened this one. I'll close it until I find the same issue.
